Dan came back with an almost 3 hour long video! It was a documentary on happiness and how to find it, he interviewed people around the world, and it was amazing :’)

summary: so i was thinking about all the drama and hate coming towards dan in the past week. and it really isnt that much. like its...
body:
so i was thinking about all the drama and hate coming towards dan in the past week. and it really isnt that much. like its probably one or a couple of people on twitter fucking things up and complaining. but you’ll always have a few people like that, because we are a large fanbase and honestly it’s inevitable. so i think we all should just collectively not give them the attention their craving.

heres to not giving them our faces but our asses.

blog.name: thedemonphanti

blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: I posted a little while ago on the fact that there was a group of people on the forum InDepthBants (IDB) that we’re accusing Dan...
body:
If you had any doubt InDepthBants was toxic, here is some proof…

I posted a little while ago on the fact that there was a group of people on the forum InDepthBants (IDB) that we’re accusing Dan of gaslighting and homophobia (not to mention it is a forum where people have encouraged and supported each other in stalking Dan and Phil in the past) and how it was an environment full of toxic groupthink and I believe in response to a post along the same lines by @dramaphan someone commented that there are dissenting opinions allowed on that website. Today IDB proved me right in saying that is absolutely not true. When one of the only people who consistently speaks out against the hive mind spoke up to disagree with others criticizing Phil for endorsing sexism, among other things, in his recent Instagram story about the slime anime, they were met with the usual dismissal and even rude responses from other posters. One poster posted this gif in response:

As a woman and a feminist, I take issue with the use of terminology meant to define sexist behaviors being thrown around because someone dislikes another person’s opinion, but at the very least, it is rude. When the poster requested the moderators of the site take action and clarify that this type of attacking other posters just for having different opinions be addressed, this the moderators of the site responded to the person being attacked with:

This response just demonstrates that minority opinions aren’t welcome and are seen as incorrect and unacceptable. The moderator says all this while in the very next paragraph, admitting that the poster “brushed up against the rules.” When the person who requested the review called them out on their selective moderating, this was the response they received:

NO, MOD, BEHAVIOR LIKE YOURS GIVES OTHER PEOPLE A BAD IMPRESSION OF THE FORUM AND MAKES PEOPLE FEEL LESS WELCOME.

I feel the need to write about this because I am an adult and so are the majority of the posters on that website, but a lot of fans of Dan and Phil are teenagers and those adults are behaving extremely poorly and trying to pass their behavior on as if it is acceptable and it is not. They have stalked Dan and Phil, attacked their character, pushed into their private lives for their own entertainment, all while claiming to be their biggest fans and that is all abusive behavior. This is what Dan was upset about in 2012. These are the things that are not respectful and are worth speaking out against and the fact that when people do speak up, they are told they should leave and that they are the problem just goes to show how toxic that forum is and that the moderators cannot be relied on to do their job. This doesn’t just apply to IDB. In life, it is never good to be part of a community or to be encouraging of one that does not allow dissent. That is a cult mentality and it is dangerous.

tags: i can see this so clearly and im soft
summary: Phan Things I Believe Are True #178
body:
Phan Things I Believe Are True #178

Sometimes when Dan keeps on blocking Phil playfully from kissing him, Phil pins him down and says he has to kiss him everywhere and does while Dan giggles and squeals and laughs while Phil acts like a kissing machine/robot as he kisses him everywhere

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Date Nights (2) Masterlist
body:
part one

Arcadia (ao3)-  legdabs (scvlly)

Summary: arcadia: n. believed by ancient greeks to be an earthly paradise.
or, date night in the south of france.

A Single Black Rose (ao3) - mels

Summary: Phil decides to surprise Dan with a date.

Blanket Fort Date Night (ao3) - MaeTaurus

Summary: After six months of touring and two solid weeks of editing their movie, Dan and Phil finally have some time to relax. Phil surprises Dan with a special date night in.

Date - phananddragonsfics

Summary: Dan and Phil have a free night while touring America, so they take a break and decide to have a little date night.

Date Night - phananddragonsfics

Summary: Dan and Phil go out on a date for the first time since adopting Winnie. Phil gets worried about leaving their kids at home.

Date Night - imeanwhiskermeup

Summary: Dan, Phil and Pj are in a polyamorous relationship and it’s date night.

Dirty Date Night - adayinthelifeofphan

Summary: Dan and Phil go out for dinner, but Phil has a little surprise for Dan.

Fate Likes to Play Practical Jokes - phananddragonsfics

Summary: Dan and Phil have hoped that tonight they’ll finally have a night to themselves, but fate seems to have a different idea.

Date Night (ao3) - scifi

Summary: It’s date night and Dan surprises Phil with some champagne and a bubble bath.

Double Date (ao3) - dangirlphillie

Summary: When Dan accidentally asks out a lesbian couple on a double date, he and Phil are forced to pretend they’ve been dating for years on a night out a town.

Inebriation (ao3) - scifi

Summary: Dan and Phil try tequila body shots.

In Sync (ao3) - librapinof

Summary: daddy!phil and neko!dan go on a romantic night out to celebrate 5 years of being together where then they end up engaged to one another and make passionate love to celebrate their lives together.

It’s All Fun And Games (Until You Get Blackmailed) - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan and Phil are in a relationship, but everybody at school thinks they hate each other. In order to have a fun date night, Dan and Phil travel out of town so nobody recognizes them. They think they’re safe, but are they?

La Vieux Port (ao3) - fleurdelester

Summary: Dan and Phil on a date in the most touristy/romantic part of Montreal I could think of.

Long Way Down - phanetixs

Summary: Date night in Leeds. Phil would say he planned it, but he really didn’t.

Nocturne - scifiphan

Summary: Dan and Phil slow dance in their lounge room on valentine’s day.

Perfect Night For Wishes - yiffandquiff

Summary: Dan hasn’t been nervous for a date in nearly 10 years. But now that Phil suddenly wants to go out for Valentine’s Day, he finds himself nervous for their date.

Play Date - softiejace

Summary: Dan and Phil need a night off parenthood duties, so they leave their son with Phil’s mum and make reservations at a nice restaurant. Only things don’t really go to plan…

Surprise Date Night - phangirling-is-life

Summary: When Phil tried to plan a romantic evening, by, once again, professing his undying love to his boyfriend, who’s cackling in the corner, mumbling something about Hannah Montana.

What We Want - itislacey

Summary: Dan and Phil have a date night, which eventually leads to them realizing what they both want for their future together.

summary: if you a phillie like this so i can follow you uwu
